title: “तृणमूल गुंडों द्वारा भाजपा कार्यकर्ताओं पर हमला”? नहीं, यह बिहार की घटना का वीडियो है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Two women BJP supporters were also roughed up allegedly by the TMC workers in Domkal while one Sagar Roy (BJP worker) was beaten up at North Malda’s Sasan area for raising voice against booth capturing. https://t.co/I23dlr3fiT
